alert.note: Alert for Simcoe Highlands (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 15 at 8:38PM PST until January 17 at 7:00PM PST by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM TUESDAY TO 7 PM PST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 7 inches and ice accumulations of around one tenth of an inch. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Simcoe Highlands. * WHEN...From 4 PM Tuesday to 7 PM PST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained for Oregon by calling 5 1 1 or by visiting online at https://tripcheck.com, or for Washington by visiting online at https://wsdot.com/travel. &&
